# mathematical programming


[mathematical programming](mathematics/mathematical programming) is a mathematical approach to finding the [optimal solution](mathematics/optimal_solution) 
to a [problem](mathematics/problem) by [optimizing](mathematics/optimization) an [objective function](mathematics/objective function) subject to [constraints](mathematics/constraint). 
The goal is to maximize or minimize the objective function while ensuring the solution is a [feasible solution](mathematics/feasible solution).
